comment: Yet, they lynch ppl for eating beef, gali ke sher hain sanghi. The Franci sanghi bhi maafiveer ke vanshaj hain, pata hai koi sunega nahi, juute padenge so alag, chup chaap ghar mein ghuss ke baith jao
